mainBanner.static: We organize the supply chain of seedlings and seeds for

introductionSection.title: We are a platform that trades **native seedlings and seeds at scale**, organizing the supply chain for forest restoration.

nurseryOwners.description: Prosperity and sustainable growth for your nursery, with **predictable revenues** and our **technical support.**

seedlingPurchasers.description: ARR projects, SAFs, compensation, and environmental regularization: seedlings and seeds **delivered on time** and **with quality.**

list.text: We take care of supplier selection
We monitor the production of purchased seedlings

aboutSilvaSection.title: About Silva
aboutSilvaSection.text:
We create supply chains for forest restoration. 

 We have been ***nurserymen*** 
 We have been ***seed collectors.*** 
 We have been ***seedling buyers.*** 

 Our team consists of professionals with **practical experience** in nurseries, seed collection, and seedling purchases. 

 Committed to biodiversity and local prosperity, we are the bridge that brings efficiency and sustainability to the forest restoration supply chain.

mapSection.title: Present <icon> where restoration happens in Brazil
mapSection.description:
We trade native seedlings and seeds at scale through an efficient and well-organized supply chain. 
 The main nurseries and projects are already with Silva. Join us too!

contactSection.title: How about we schedule a quick chat?
contactSection.subtitle: We want to understand your situation to support you in the best way possible.
contactSection.text: Send us a WhatsApp message or fill out the form. We will get in touch.

formInputs.question: Which profile do you identify with?

items.question: How can I start buying seedlings with Silva?
items.answer: Simple! Sign up on our platform and explore the diversity of suppliers, seedlings, and seeds. Our team is ready to assist at every step of the process.

items.question: How does Silva contribute to the quality of seedlings?
items.answer: We work with nurseries that we certify and conduct regular technical visits to ensure that the seedlings meet the required quality standards.

items.question: What are the advantages for nurseries working with Silva?
items.answer: We offer access to a wide market, technical support, state-of-the-art equipment, and assurance of fair compensation for your work.

items.question: How does Silva help nurseries?
items.answer: We bring long-term orders and better commercial conditions to nurseries through our relationships and access to major seedling and seed buyers in Brazil. Additionally, we map the main needs of our partner nurseries and promote necessary improvements, whether commercial, operational, regulatory, or administrative, in a customized manner.

workWithUsSection.title: Work with Us
workWithUsSection.subtitle: Transform forest restoration as part of our team
workWithUsSection.description:
At Silva, we are always looking for talents passionate about nature-based solutions and sustainable development. 
 If you want to be part of a team at the **forefront of forest restoration in Brazil**, come grow with us.
